servers.description: Current server (uses the same domain as this documentation)

type.description: User type: User, Admin, or Host
Optional: Filter login by user type. If provided, only users of this type can login.

message.example: Access denied. This account is for User users, not Host users.

post.description: Sends a password reset token to the user's email

message.example: Password reset link has been sent to your email
We could not find a user with that email address.

post.description: Resets user password using the reset token

get.description: Returns property details and booking summary information

post.description: Creates a new booking for a property

get.description: Returns all bookings for the authenticated user with filtering options

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by booking type: upcoming, past, or all (default: all)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search bookings by property name, location, or status

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by booking status: pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed

get.description: Returns contact form submissions for the authenticated user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of contacts returned (default: 10, max: 50)

post.description: Submit a new contact form inquiry with optional file attachments

files[].description: Optional file attachments (max 5 files, max 10MB each)

get.description: Returns featured properties, popular stays, and favorites for the home page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of properties returned per section (default: 10, max: 50)

popular.description: Popular stays based on ratings and reviews

get.description: Returns a paginated list of bookings for properties owned by the authenticated host

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query (searches in guest name, email, property title)

message.example: Access denied. This resource is only available for Host accounts.

post.description: Creates a new booking for a property owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This property does not belong to you.

get.description: Returns details of a specific booking for a property owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This booking does not belong to your properties.

put.description: Updates an existing booking for a property owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This booking does not belong to your properties.

delete.description: Deletes a booking for a property owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This booking does not belong to your properties.

get.summary: Get users list for starting conversation
get.description: Returns a list of users that the host can start conversations with

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search users by name or email

message.example: Access denied. This resource is only available for Host accounts.

get.description: Returns all conversations for properties owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This resource is only available for Host accounts.

post.description: Creates a new conversation with a user or returns existing one

message.example: Access denied. This property does not belong to you.

get.description: Returns all messages for a specific conversation

post.description: Sends a message in a conversation

files.description: Array of file uploads (images or videos)

get.description: Returns earnings statistics and paginated list of earnings from bookings

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search earnings by booking ID, guest name, or property title

get.description: Returns details of a specific earning from a booking
Returns a paginated list of payouts for the authenticated host

post.description: Creates a new payout request for the authenticated host

get.description: Returns details of a specific payout
Returns all properties for the authenticated host with filtering and pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search properties by title, location, or description

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status: Active, Inactive, Pending

message.example: Access denied. This resource is only available for Host accounts.

post.description: Creates a new property for the authenticated host

get.description: Returns details of a specific property owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This property does not belong to you.

put.description: Updates an existing property owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This property does not belong to you.

delete.description: Deletes a property owned by the authenticated host

message.example: Access denied. This property does not belong to you.

get.description: Returns all conversations for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new conversation or returns existing one for a property

get.description: Returns all messages for a specific conversation

post.description: Sends a message in a conversation

files.description: Array of file uploads (images or videos)

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile information

422.description: Validation error or invalid current password

post.description: Uploads and updates the authenticated user's profile picture

profile_picture.description: Profile picture image file (JPG, PNG, GIF, max 2MB)

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's currency preference

get.description: Returns filtered properties with support for search, location, price, guests, dates, and sorting

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query (searches in title, location, description)

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: Array of location filters (can be passed multiple times: ?locations=Europe&locations=Asia)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort order: featured, price_low, price_high, rating_high

get.description: Returns guest favorite properties for the wishlist page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of properties returned (default: 10, max: 50)

description.example: Beautiful beachfront villa with stunning ocean views
Beautiful beachfront villa with stunning ocean views

apiAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
apiAuth.name: Authorization
